title: nIyanri nAnillai
sahitya:
nIyanri nAnillai ninaippillai sheyalillai nilaiyonrum illai iraivA


anupallavi

  vAyil un vAimaiyai manattil un tUimaiyai vAzhvil un anbinai vaLarttiDa nI aruLvAi


caraNam    yAkkai unadu shakti Alayam enak-kAppEn aNuvaNuvilum unran aruLADalaip-pArppEn
vAkkai nin kAviya mAlaiyAik-kOppEn mangala manamaNa varaiyil edir pArppEn
